title: 88/15/EEC: Commission Decision of 17 December 1987 amending Decision 86/77/EEC approving certain food-aid operations carried out by humanitarian organizations and exempting them from monetary compensatory amounts (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 17 December 1987  amending Decision 86/77/EEC approving certain food-aid operations carried out by humanitarian organizations and exempting them from monetary compensatory amounts  (Only the English text is authentic)    (88/15/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The humanitarian organization 'Assemblies of God Property Trust' is added to the Annex of Decision 86/77/EEC, with effect from 21 October 1987.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 December 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
